edited_stories.edited_story_text: The family took a trip to this castle in the mountains. The lake was beautiful with glassy, reflective water. This is a larger picture of the castle in all its glory. Here is a photo of a decorated wall from where we ate lunch. We then took a break before heading back out to see this sculpture of a woman holding ice cream.
